sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"必不可少的，必需的"之意。
means: indispensable ： 语气强，侧重指绝对必要性或不可缺少性。
essential ： 指对事物本身性质具有决定性的重要性，暗含不可缺少，否则便无法存在。
necessary ： 最常用词，侧重由客观因素决定的某种需要，强调不可避免，但并非绝不可缺少。
requisite ： 正式用词，特指为实现某一目的或得到某种结果而应有的需要，有时可与necessary换用。

sentence.Network_en: An intelligent computer will be an indispensable diagnostic tool for doctors.
sentence.Network_cn: 智能计算机将成为医生不可或缺的诊断工具。

sentence.Network_en: Cars have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 汽车已成了我们生活中必不可少的一部分。

sentence.Network_en: He is indispensable to our work, we cannot do it without him.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于我们的工作来说,他是不可缺少的,没有他, 我们就做不了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2013考研英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... indignant 生气的，愤怒的 indispensable 必不可少的 infectious 传染的，传染性的.
《四级词汇词根+联想记忆法(乱序版)》_百度文库 ... institute 协会 indispensable 不可缺少的 scheme 计划.
...断机构在宣告豁免时需要考虑三个要件：目标特定、手段不可或缺（indispensible）以及成本与收益可控。
Famous painting Dingzhou mixed vegetable tofu brick road is indispensable ., 有名的定州杂绘菜是少不了砖路豆腐的.

list.abs: 四级写... ... 49、把成功/错误归咎于： attribute/own the success/failure to 50、对……重要： be indispensable/important/vital to.
indirect division 间接分裂[育]indispensable enzyme 必需酶individual 个体,单株
When an end is lawful obligatory , the indispensable means to is are also lawful obligatory ., 如果一个目的是正当而必须做的 , 则达到这个目的的必要手段也是正当而必须采取的.
indirect water hammer 间接水锤indispensable element 必需元素indium 铟

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'not to be allowed or provided for by ecclesiastical dispensation'): from medieval Latin indispensabilis, from in- 'not' + dispensabilis (see dispensable)

entry.tran: 必不可少的;不可或缺的
entry.def: If you say that someone or something is indispensable, you mean that they are absolutely essential and other people or things cannot function without them.

example.ex: She was becoming indispensable to him.
example.tran: 他已变得越来越离不开她了。

example.ex: ...the indispensable guide for any traveller in France.
example.tran: 在法国对任何游客来说都不可缺少的向导

means.word_mean: 1. not to be dispensed with; essential;

sentences.sentence: "funds essential to the completion of the project"
"the routine but indispensable ceremonies of state"

auth_sentence.content: I don't think any exotic plants are indispensable.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't think any exotic plants are indispensable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't think any exotic plants are indispensable.

auth_sentence.content: Kitchen gadgetry remains indispensable to the hurly-burly of twentieth-century life.
auth_sentence.res_content: Kitchen gadgetry remains indispensable to the hurly-burly of twentieth-century life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Kitchen gadgetry remains indispensable to the hurly-burly of twentieth-century life.

auth_sentence.content: An indispensable part of man's moral and mental outfit.
auth_sentence.res_content: An indispensable part of man's moral and mental outfit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An indispensable part of man's moral and mental outfit.

Sentence.sentence: It is an indispensable device on an airplane.
The automatic lift is indispensable in skyscrapers.

means.word_mean: 必不可少的, 必需的

sentences.cn: 这是一本必不可少的书。

sentences.en: For a successful class humour is indispensable.
sentences.cn: 要在课堂上取得成功, 幽默是必不可少的。

jushi.chinese: 这是一本必不可少的书。

jushi.english: For a successful leader ability is indispensable.
jushi.chinese: 对于一个成功的领导人来说能力是必不可少的。
